name: Chicken Fajita Omelet
ingredients: 2 ounces leftover sliced fajita chicken, about 1/2 cup *
2 tablespoons leftover saut√©ed peppers and onions *

instructions.en: Heat the butter in a large nonstick skillet over medium heat.
Pour beaten eggs into the hot skillet, tilting to spread evenly. Sprinkle lightly with salt and pepper.
When egg starts to set but is still moist, arrange warmed chicken slices down the center of the omelet.
Top with warmed pepper and onion mixture, then sprinkle cheese over the peppers.
Cook until egg is set but not dry. Fold sides of the omelet over the filling with a spatula.
Cook a few more seconds to melt the cheese, then slide onto a serving plate.
Top with salsa and sour cream.

notes: This recipe makes 1 serving. Do not freeze. * Warm leftover chicken, peppers, and onions in the microwave before adding to the omelet.
